Package UserData

Class Authenticator

java.lang.Object
UserData.DataManager
UserData.Authenticator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Authenticator extends DataManager implements Observer
The Authenticator class is responsible for managing user authentication and data management. It provides methods for validating user and admin credentials, adding users and cards, sending OTPs (One-Time Passwords) via email, and uploading and loading data from files. It also implements the Observer interface to receive notifications when data is updated.
